sub_fields.label: Spacer Height
sub_fields.name: spacer_height
sub_fields.instructions: Enter only a number, either negative or positive.

sub_fields.label: Spacer Measurement
sub_fields.name: spacer_measurement
sub_fields.instructions: Select measurement used to calculate spacer height.

choices.em: em (relative to the font-size of the element)

sub_fields.label: Visibility
sub_fields.name: visibility
sub_fields.instructions: Choose which devices you'd like to display the spacer on.

sub_fields.label: Notes
sub_fields.name: notes
sub_fields.instructions: Add optional notes here to explain the reasoning for the spacer.
sub_fields.placeholder: eg: Used to remove space between modules

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Outputs all published team profiles in a grid format.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: Outputs all published properties grid format.

sub_fields.label: Number of Columns
sub_fields.name: number_of_columns
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the number of columns for desktop screens (this will decrease elegantly for tablets & mobile).

sub_fields.label: Send Notification To
sub_fields.name: send_notification_to
sub_fields.instructions: If blank this will default to the site administrator's email address.

sub_fields.label: Use Labels as Placeholders?
sub_fields.name: use_labels_as_placeholders
sub_fields.instructions: Where possible, use the label as a placeholder.

sub_fields.label: Input Options
sub_fields.name: input_options
sub_fields.instructions: List the options available for the input field.

sub_fields.label: Anchor ID
sub_fields.name: anchor_id
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a name for this anchor with no spaces or special characters. This field is required for this module to work.

sub_fields.label: Offset
sub_fields.name: offset
sub_fields.instructions: Enter number of pixels to offset the scroll when anchoring to this section.
